shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
      • shapes.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Polygon

    public class Line
extends Shape
    Represents a Line on the canvas. This class extends Shape by an array of Coordinates (the Line's vertices).
    See Also:
    Shape, Polygon, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Line()
      Creates a new Line with default attributes.
      Line(java.util.List<Coordinate> coordinates)
      Creates a new Line with the specified attributes and default Shape attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Coordinate> getCoordinates()
      Returns a List of the Coordinates of the Line's vertices.
      java.lang.String getHTML()
      Returns a String representation of the Line as an SVG object in HTML.
      protected java.lang.String getHTMLAttributes()
      Returns a String representation of the Line's attributes as chained HTML attributes.
      void setCoordinates(java.util.List<Coordinate> coordinates)
      Sets the Line's vertices.

      • setCoordinates

        public void setCoordinates(java.util.List<Coordinate> coordinates)
        Sets the Line's vertices. This operation overwrites the already existing vertices with the new ones.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - A List of the Coordinates of the Line's new vertices.
